about_the_game:
YOU WANNA PLAY ROUGH?

The Scarface™ Heist Pack is the 37th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2. The Scarface™ Heist Pack comes with The Scarface™ Mansion Heist, 2 new weapons, 4 masks, materials and patterns and 6 Achievements.

GOING TO MIAMI TO HIT WHERE IT HURTS

The PAYDAY gang is coming through with blazing guns in Miami to take out someone that really have it coming. The Sosa cartel had the nerve to ambush one of the Butcher’s weapons smuggling operations in Central America. The Butcher is not one to be messed with and that’s how you come in. The contract is ready, the Sosa Cartel will pay.


THE SCARFACE™ MANSION

The Butcher is sending a message and the PAYDAY gang is her heralds. Blood and death is the only thing these people understand. The Sosa HQ is in a legendary old drug lord’s mansion and to assault it the gang needs to get creative. Trash the place, draw the Sosas out and kill the boss, or do a stealth approach and sneak in, assassinate the boss and sneak out. Either way, get all of the loot as icing on the cake. Experience the Scarface™ legacy like you’ve always wanted, and turn Miami’s drug market upside down.


THE COMMANDO 101 ROCKET LAUNCHER

Lets fight with style wielding a badass rocket launcher loaded with no less than 4 warheads. Use this mayhem machine to blast anyone who stands in your way 4 times in 4 seconds. COMMANDO 101 is for those moments when you really wanna take a stand.


THE HOTLINE 8000X

If you are looking for some 80’s action, then you are actually looking at it right now. Really, you say? That’s a phone. Make no mistake - this is not just any phone. This is the HOTLINE 8000X. The height of communication in the 80´s. Now this isn’t for phoning anymore, it’s for fighting. 80’s calling. Hello, who’s there? I just called to say.. I hate you.


MASKS


Four new masks to wear as you make the world yours. Exalted, Golden hour, Barrori FLEX and Panthera Tigris, at your disposal.


MATERIALS

Four brand new materials comes with the Scarface™ Heist Pack, bound together by an American dream of liberty and of creating your own luxurious future: Oxidized Copper Golden Hour, Red Velvet and Black Marble.


PATTERNS

Make your mark with the four new patterns in the Scarface™ Heist Pack: Liberty Flame, Cold Coins, Diablada and Cracks.


ACHIEVEMENTS

The Scarface™ Heists Pack come with 6 new achievements for those players that strive for reaching the top of the gangster empire.
